jrobots.simulation.scenario

Class RaceMode

  • java.lang.Object
    • jrobots.simulation.scenario.RaceMode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SimulationMode

    public class RaceMode
extends java.lang.Object
implements SimulationMode
    • Several participants
    • Progress on track is relevant, instead of hitpoints
    • A given number of laps has to be reached to end the match.
    • healing via simulation hook.
    • Ranking for n participants: n points for winner, n-1-rank points for others.

      • drawLandscape

        public void drawLandscape(ArenaController arenaController,
                          javax.media.opengl.GL gl,
                          Vector drawableSize,
                          SimulationRun simulationRun,
                          int simulationStateIndex)
        Description copied from interface: SimulationMode
        As SimulationModes have different Landscapes, drawing the background is their obligation.
        Specified by:
        drawLandscape in interface SimulationMode
        Parameters:
        arenaController - - for drawing
        gl - - drawing routines need that
        drawableSize - - size of canvas
        simulationRun - - the entire run, because sometimes we need to access more than the current state, which should be drawn
        simulationStateIndex - - index of the SimulationState within the entire SimulationRun that should be drawn by this call
